title: Canada’s Ontario gov’t cancels $100m Starlink contract, seeks domestic alternative
summary: In a move that has shocked tech enthusiasts nationwide, the Ontario government has decided to cancel its $100 million contract with Elon Musk’s Starlink satellite internet service. The decision comes as the province seeks to invest in a domestic alternative to meet the increasing demand for high-speed internet access in rural and remote areas. The […]

title: After Backlash, ChatGPT Removes Option to Have Private Chats Indexed by Google
summary: ChatGPT, the popular AI-powered chat platform, recently came under fire for allowing private chat conversations to be indexed by Google, raising serious privacy concerns among its users. In response to the backlash, the company swiftly took action and removed the option to have private chats indexed by search engines. This move has been welcomed by […]

title: Delta denies using AI to come up with inflated, personalized prices | Delta finally explains how its AI pricing works amid ongoing backlash.
summary: A recent Reddit post has been making waves in the tech community, as it alleges that Delta Air Lines has been using artificial intelligence (AI) to come up with inflated, personalized prices for its customers. summary: As we look ahead to the year 2025, it’s clear that the role of consultants in the business world is facing a major disruption. summary: In a surprising turn of events, the Ontario government has announced the cancellation of a $100 million contract with Elon Musk’s Starlink satellite internet service.
